welcome_message_body: Welcome to Taitung, Taiwan! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city, known for its stunning natural landscapes, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Taitung has to offer!

restaurants.name: 客來吃樂
